features: Mount your Video Doorbell Wired (2021 release) on angled siding or towards a staircase for improved motion detection and a better view of visitors.
Adjust your viewing angle by 10° and 20°.
Only works with Ring Video Doorbell Wired (2021 release).

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 12, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Works with a few tweeks!
reviews.reviewText: This was purchased for a 2nd Gen Ring doorbell. After ordering several, we decided this was the one that would work the best although screw holes were not in the correct place. It is installed and works fine.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 3, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars It's a ring mount so...
reviews.reviewText: It's a ring mount so of course it fits. I was surprised that I didn't get THIS mount with my original purchase instead of a corner mount. And it's a bit pricey. It's also kind of a pain to install it but it works good.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 7, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars This IS NOT compatible with my Ring video doorbell 1080p HD as was advertised. UPDATED
reviews.reviewText: Updated:The customer service team reached out to me and were extremely polite and helpful. They explained to me the issues mentioned below with how the listing states the purchased part is compatible with my device even if it is not. They sent out the correct wedge kit and it fits perfectly. Thank you for the great support Link!I bought this kit specifically because Amazon stated it would fit the device I had just purchased. This need to be fixed because the listing is misleading. It is far too small for the Ring doorbell I purchased. I now need to return this priduct and find another way to angle my doorbell down.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 7, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Needed two of the three wedges to make it level. Easy to install
reviews.reviewText: It came with three wedges that are stackable. My previous Ring doorbell only needed one wedge to be straight up and down. On this doorbell, the second gen, it took two of the three wedges to make it straight up and down.It came with multiple size screws to work with one, two, or three wedges. Very easy to install and uninstall when we determined just one wedge was not enough. My previous Ring Doorbell came with a wedge, this one did not so when it comes to value, I put ok as I really do not think it should have been a separate purchase, but that is just my opinion.Would buy again if needed, and would suggest to someone needing a wedge for a second generation wedge.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 26, 2024
reviews.reviewText: These work well to even up the ring camera on lap siding.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 22, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Don't trust Amazon if says it's right for your purchase!
reviews.reviewText: Update; after writing this review, was contacted Ring. After listening to my tail of woa, and validing that I actually had an account she went ahead and sent me replacements of the correct wedge needed. So I've got folks a hi-five for customer service and support. New wedges came in next day (surprise-surprise) and they are now installed and working great! I also mentioned that the screws supplied are perhaps not the best for the wedges unless a small washer is also used. With the tapered head on the screw, it's more designed for flush mounting in woood. As it is, it is all too easy to tighten the screw right through the slot in the wedge. Likewise, it would also be very easy for someone to yank the doorbell off of whatever it's attached to. So, bump the rating to 3 stars, still, don't trust Amazon 100% for ordering stuff but loved the customer attention from Ring.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 3, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Easy set up
reviews.reviewText: It comes with 3 sections to increase the angle if you’re trying to point the camera to view down stairs. Gave the box to my son with the drill and he set it up. Used the live feed of the camera to adjust the angle.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 2, 2024
reviews.reviewText: The instructions was almost nonexistent. Ordered 1 got 3 in a bag. So total crap. Couldn't send back because they were damaged trying to put it together with the solar charger. This was, according to the hype supposed to be easy. Ring bell is nice but open your wallet if you need accessories. Very unhappy ☹️. $75 for more things to hopefully get it right.

I was not sure if I need these wedges but order them just in case.I received 2 identical ones and always wanted to return them. But they though did not angled the doorbell but having them double up give the camera a better view.
Se ajusta perfecto al modelo Ring 2020. Corrige bien el ángulo de la cámara.
Does not fit at all. Look at the original from the manufacturer.Waste of money in my case.
Bought the Ring Doorbell and used the back plate to install perfectly in position

Unbelievable that RING would issue such a deceptive packaging, Package is stated as 18.8 x 14.1 x 3,9 cm, so one woud assume the brackets /wedges are somewhat smallerBelieve it. the wedges are only 10 x 4.5 cm, what a joke.Must fit a bell build last century.The packaging, consisting of a plastic bag is way overdone,No info was given as to which bell this was to fit,Buyers be ware when you buy anything from anyone ensure there is a full description as well as all measurements available,The measurements should be of the article and not the packagingThis was a complete wasteof money and landed in tjhe rubbish bin
